info.title: Zenler
info.description: Zenler is an all-in-one course creation, delivery, and marketing platform.

delete.description: Remove a user from your account.

post.description: Enrolls a user to a course.
Unenrolls a user from a course.

get.description: Retrieves a course by course identifier.
Retrieves a list of enrollments for a funnel.

post.description: Subscribe a user to a funnel.
Unsubscribes a user from a funnel.

get.description: Retrieves a list of upcoming live classes.

post.description: Register a user for a live class.
Unregister a user for a live class.

get.description: Retrieve a list of upcoming live webinars.

post.description: Register a user for a live webinar.
Unregister a user for a live webinar.

get.description: Retrieves a brief list of enrollments.
Retrieves a detailed list of enrollments.
Retrieves a brief report of sales.
Retrieves a brief report of course progress.
Retrieves a detailed report of course progress.
Retrieves a brief report of affiliates.
Retrieves a detailed report of affiliates.
